articles.title: Nick Kyrgios topples No. 4 seed Stefanos Tsitsipas in wild, outburst-filled Wimbledon match
articles.description: Australian Nick Kyrgios beat fourth-seeded Stefanos Tsitsipas in a wild, outburst-filled third-round match at Wimbledon where both players received code violations.
articles.content:
WIMBLEDON, England -- Nick Kyrgios cursed at the Wimbledon chair umpire and asked, "Are you dumb?''
